title: Mega Shell Commands
content:
`Source` 

## Source
     https://github.com/meganz/MEGAcmd/blob/master/UserGuide.md



## Login
```shell
# Login into MEGA account
$ login [email] [password]
```

## Share Folder
```shell
# Share folder and generate link
$ export [foldername]
# Disable folder
$ export -d [foldername]
# Share folder with expiration time
$ export [foldername] --expire=60s
```

## Upload/Download
```shell
# Download File
$ get [foldername]

# Upload File
$ put [foldername]
```


Alice in borderland
